text:
@antonioguterres Meanwhile in Yemen, after a 5 year long civil war that’s still going on and 3.6 million people displaced as of today, there are outbreaks of:

Dengue
Malaria
Cholera 
Covid-19

All at the same time.

Could the @UN help Yemen?
Just asking.
